data.title: Song: Unforgettable written by Irving Gordon
data.meta_description: The song Unforgettable was written by Irving Gordon and was first recorded and released by Nat King Cole in 1951. It was covered by G.C. Davis, Peter Erskine presents Joe Mazzone, Nat Brown, Benjamin Utecht - Anne Cochran and other artists.
data.text:
